long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the WhatsApp Blur Extension for Chrome by Altois!

Protect your privacy and keep your conversations confidential with our easy-to-use WhatsApp blur extension.

This essential tool allows you to blur sensitive information on your WhatsApp Web, ensuring that prying eyes can't see your private chats.

Features:
- Toggle Blur: Quickly enable or disable the blur effect with a single click.
- Blur Settings: Customize what you want to blur, including:
       - All Messages in Chat: Hide the content of your messages for total privacy.
       - Last Messages Preview: Blur the preview of the last messages in your chat list.
       - Profile Pictures: Keep profile pictures private by blurring them.
       - Group/Users Names: Protect the names of your contacts and groups by blurring them out.

Our WhatsApp blur extension is perfect for use in public places, shared workspaces, or whenever you need an extra layer of privacy. Download the WhatsApp Blur Extension today and ensure your conversations remain confidential!
